messages.ssml: <speak>According to the Center for Disease Control and Prevention, please avoid close contact with people and especially those who are sick. Close contact is considered within about 6 feet. This is especially important for people who are at higher risk of getting very sick.</speak>

messages.speech: According to the Center for Disease Control and Prevention, please avoid close contact with people and especially those who are sick. Close contact is considered within about 6 feet. This is especially important for people who are at higher risk of getting very sick.
